CustomField.description: Set to TRUE if account is used for integration or automation. Used to determine if a record was created by automation. i.e. If Record.CreatedBy.Service Account = TRUE when the record is created by an automation. LAMBDA-36987
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Set to TRUE if account is used for integration or automation. Used to determine if a record was created by automation. i.e. If Record.CreatedBy.Service Account = TRUE when the record is created by an automation.
CustomField.label: Service Account
